text:
Transport Regulations 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Transport Act 1981 .

19 June 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Transport Regulations 2023 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which the Taxi and Hire Vehicle Industries Regulations 2023 commence.

3. Payments in respect of which exemptions or rebates may be granted
    For the purposes of section 5(1)(d) of the Act, the fees specified in Schedule 3 to the Taxi and Hire Vehicle Industries Regulations 2023 are prescribed as payments relating to transport for which full or partial exemptions or rebates may be granted by the Commission.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2023

These regulations are administered in the Department of State Growth.
